welcome_message_body: Welcome to Libertyville, where small-town charm meets big-city amenities! Known for its picturesque downtown area and rich history, we invite you to explore and experience all that our vibrant community has to offer. We hope you enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pal-Waukee Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Pal-Waukee Airport caters to private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for United Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for Delta Air Lines, Air Canada, and Alaska Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for American Airlines, Iberia, and Japan Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: Serves international flights for various airlines including Lufthansa, Emirates, and Qatar Airways.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kenosha Regional Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Kenosha Regional Airport is used for shipping and receiving of goods.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dupage County Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Dupage County Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
